params._newGreeting: (string memory) - new greeting to save on the contract

setGreeting(string).notice: Function that allows anyone to change the state variable "greeting" of the contract and increase the counters

withdraw().notice: Function that allows the owner to withdraw all the Ether in the contract The function can only be called by the owner of the contract as defined by the isOwner modifier
